snippet: Ms. Lopez has drawn scrutiny for singing “Happy Birthday” to the country’s president, who was in attendance.
abstract: Singer Jennifer Lopez has drawn criticism for performing at event in Turkmenistan and singing Happy Birthday to country's president Gurbanguly Berdymukhammedov, who has been criticized by human rights organizations for pattern of oppressive rule since taking office in 2006.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Lopez has drawn scrutiny for singing “Happy Birthday” to the country’s president, who was in attendance.

headline.print_headline: Jennifer Lopez Faulted For Turkmenistan Show
headline.main: Jennifer Lopez Faulted for Turkmenistan Show
